jobTitle: Account Manager (Los Angeles or Minneapolis Only) - Remote
description:
Join Our Team at a Leading Market Research Firm

We are a full-service custom market research firm known for our innovative research design and consultative approach. At our company, we're passionate about producing groundbreaking qualitative and quantitative research through creative design, rigorous execution, and enduring insights. Our team values out-of-the-box thinking, follows a structured execution process, and is empowered to deliver top-quality research that truly matters to our clients.

We're currently seeking an Account Manager to join our team. In this role, you'll play a key part in identifying new business opportunities and nurturing existing client relationships. Our client portfolio includes a diverse range of Fortune 500 companies across various industries such as technology, CPG, retail, media, communication, and financial services. We're excited to welcome you aboard and see the new research projects you'll bring to our team!

About You

You have a minimum of 8 years of experience in market research or consumer insights, either on the supplier or client side.

Demonstrated experience in serving clients within a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment, preferably in a business development or consulting role.

You're self-motivated and driven to achieve business development targets, aiming to grow your own book of business within our team.

Ability to provide customized solutions to diverse clients across industries.

You possess strong leadership skills, enjoy collaboration, and naturally seek opportunities to coach and mentor junior team members.

You have an ambitious curiosity and thrive on new challenges.

Tech-savvy with excellent written and verbal communication skills, strong presentation skills, and impeccable attention to detail and organization.

What You'll Be Doing

Identify and manage a targeted list of prospective clients, while also nurturing existing client relationships.

Conduct daily outbound sales prospecting activities and contribute to marketing efforts to enhance our brand profile and generate inbound leads and RFPs.

Develop winning proposals and design innovative qualitative and quantitative research studies.

Collaborate with the research team to oversee project execution, ensuring methodology is followed, issues are resolved promptly, and final reports exceed client expectations.

Serve as the main client contact throughout the research process, ensuring their strategic business objectives are met and exploring opportunities to expand our services.

What We Offer

Daily opportunities for variety, challenge, and growth.

Excellent career advancement and mentorship opportunities.

A collaborative, team-oriented, and high-performing atmosphere.

Competitive salary commensurate with experience and skills, with compensation ranging from $100,000 - $300,000.

Potential eligibility for a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, vision, 401k matching, paid time off, and in-person and virtual social activities.

Flexibility to work remotely, with an option for a hybrid setup in our Santa Monica office.

Join Us in Our Remote-First Environment

As a Remote First company, we've supported our employees in working remotely since March 2020 to prioritize health and safety during the COVID-19 Pandemic. While we embrace remote work, all new hires must reside in the Greater Los Angeles or Minneapolis/St. Paul areas and be available for in-person meet-ups to enhance collaboration, mentorship, and team bonding.

Application Details

This posting is for applicants located in CA or MN.

Relocation assistance is not offered, and while this is a remote-first position, we can only hire in the states of CA or MN at this time.

Please indicate your planned city of work/residence in your application.

Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis until all positions are filled.

Join us in shaping the future of market research and making a meaningful impact on our clients' businesses!

Employment Type: Full-Time
